cn.description:
MagicKit AI – 全能设备与实用工具包

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的实用工具应用，旨在帮助您监控设备状态、优化性能，并从一个便捷界面访问日常工具。专为 iOS 打造，MagicKit AI 集合了多种核心功能，同时保护您的隐私并节省电池。

设备与系统工具：
• 电池状态：查看当前电量和充电状态
• 存储使用情况：分析可用与已用空间
• 设备信息：查看基本硬件与系统详情
• 运行时间监控：了解设备持续运行时间
• 电池使用建议：获取实用省电技巧
• 照片清理：检测并删除重复或相似照片以释放空间

网络工具：
• 网速测试：测量您的互联网连接速度
• Wi-Fi 信息：查看网络名称、IP 地址和连接状态
• IP 查询：查看公网 IP 的地理位置

实用工具：
• 单位换算器：支持多种单位互转
• 货币转换器：实时汇率与换算
• 日期时间计算器：支持工作日差值计算
• 时区转换器：全球时间转换，含夏令时支持
• 倒计时与提醒：创建美观倒计时，可自定义提醒与重复事件
• Magic 计数器：多项目统计追踪，含连续天数与数据统计
• 二维码扫描：快速识别二维码
• 文档扫描：高质量扫描保存文档
• 指南针与水平仪：使用设备传感器测量方向与水平
• 屏幕方向锁定：在应用内锁定屏幕方向
• 音频检测仪：通过麦克风测量环境音量
• 剪贴板管理器：访问并管理当前会话复制内容
• 手电筒：开启设备手电筒
• 亮度调节：直接在应用内调整屏幕亮度

功能亮点：
• 简洁易用的向导式界面
• 无广告，无内购
• 轻量节能
• 兼容所有 iOS 设备
• 工具持续更新添加
• 注重隐私与性能设计

适用人群：
• 设备状态监控与性能优化
• 日常换算与测量任务
• 文档与二维码扫描
• 照片清理释放空间
• 倒计时提醒管理
• 习惯追踪与进度统计
• 快速工具访问（如手电筒、亮度）
• 简易网络诊断

立即下载 MagicKit AI，用一个智能强大的工具包简化您的日常任务！

cn.description:
《旋转音律》是一款活用了手机陀螺仪功能的体感音乐游戏。力求带来前所未有的崭新音乐游戏体验。
旋转手机，感受在星河间穿梭的快感。带上耳机，共赴鼓点与星光相伴的宇宙之旅。

=用体感，玩音乐=
不同于传统音游的点按式判定，在《旋转音律》中，你需要通过快速旋转手机来完成部分音符的判定——就像驾驶赛车穿越急弯那样。这将会是如同街机般爽快的音乐游戏体验。

=风格多变的音乐曲目=
众多音游知名曲师参与供稿并提供独家曲目！节奏电音、JPOP、西方歌剧、韩文流行、重金摇滚，风格多样不单调。更有丰富新曲目定期加入游戏曲库。

=梦与约定之地，爱与成长之旅=
跟随伊洛踏上宇宙之旅，追寻友人的足迹，邂逅不同星球的居民，拯救阿古亚星的命运。一路见证伊洛的成长吧！

问题反馈：rotaeno@xd.com

cn.description:
概览

— 先进的 RAW 处理：借助易用的控件，解锁 Apple RAW 引擎的力量。利用与 Apple 的专业照片处理应用 Aperture 同样出色的 RAW 处理功能，增强你的照片。独特的增强可以帮助你通过其他应用程序无法媲美的方式改进照片品质。

— 整理：RAW Power 是一款功能齐全的照片应用，可以整理和管理你的照片图库。全面兼容 iCloud 照片图库，因此所有更改都可保持同步。每一张照片和每一项功能，都可供你的 iPhone 或 iPad 上的每一个应用访问。

— 评级和筛选：按照文件类型、评级、标记和编辑状态筛选相簿。评级和标记可通过 iCloud 照片图库同步！

—“文件”应用：在照片图库或“文件”应用中存储照片。使用新的共享扩展，直接从其他应用导入到 RAW Power 的文件容器中。使用同样的非破坏式编辑、评级和筛选功能！（不支持 iCloud 同步）。

— 不仅仅是 RAW：RAW Power 能够完美处理 JPEG，提供“照片”应用中缺失的诸多工具。更有创新的景深效果，适用于具有双摄像头系统的 iPhone 拍摄的照片。

— 跨平台编辑：在 iOS 中编辑，而后在 Mac 上使用 macOS 版 RAW Power 3 继续（或反之）。
— 批处理：对多张照片应用预设、粘贴调整，以及执行导出。导出到照片图库或“文件”应用。

整理和显示

— 最多可放大 800%，进行极致精确的调整。

— 创建和重命名相簿，从相簿和图库删除照片，以及将照片移入相簿中。完整访问你的文件夹层次结构。

— 显示文件名、曝光信息、闪光灯状态以及位置地图。

实时编辑

— 齐全的非破坏式编辑功能。所有更改多存储到 iOS 照片图库和 iCloud 照片图库中，你可以在一台设备上编辑，而后到另一台设备上继续处理，不会丢失任何细节。甚至 Mac 和 iOS 之间也可接力！

— 小屏幕优化。选择要默认显示的调整以及显示顺序

— 通过加强和复原滑块进行无与伦比的亮部复原。实时控制 Apple RAW 引擎，包括噪点去除、黑色点和色域图等

— 自动增强、自动白平衡、自动色彩水平和自动色调曲线。一次性应用到多张照片！

— 针对一张或多张照片，应用预设和复制/粘贴调整

— 带有裁剪指示框和热像素叠加的色阶分布图

— 含有内置外观和胶卷模拟的 LUT（查找表）。也可自己添加！

— 裁剪和摆正，旋转和翻转，以及带有取样器和自动调整的白平衡功能

— 亮部、阴影、鲜艳度、局部对比，以及令人称绝的浅色和深色滑块

— 色调曲线和色彩水平色调曲线具有线性和实验模式，以及取样器

— 景深效果可借助双摄像头系统来增强拍摄的照片

— 可校正镜头失真的彩色边缘，以及变形、黑白和带有可调整中心点的晕影等

— 所有滑块都可实时应用，并通过 GPU 加速

— 高精度深度彩色成像引擎

— 导出 JPEG、PNG 和 TIFF（8 位和 16 位）到“文件”应用或“照片”应用


兼容性

— 兼容数百款相机，包括 iPhone RAW 照片（iOS 14 - 列表见  https://www.gentlemencoders.com/extended-raw/index.html）。RAW 支持由 Apple 在后台下载。你的设备必须连入 WiFi 并接通电源，才能获得更新。

— 完美处理 JPEG、TIFF、PNG 和大多数 DNG

— 视频教程 (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7l78rOzFxaHG-e5AT-MGWQ)


Mac 版 RAW POWER

RAW Power 也可从 Mac App Store 获得，提供照片应用扩展和独立应用（带照片图库支持）两种形式。全世界评分都在 4.5 星以上！


关于 GENTLEMEN CODERS

Gentlemen Coders 由 Apple 前任高级工程总监成立。如需更多信息，请访问 www.gentlemencoders.com。

hk.description:
MagicKit AI – 全方位裝置與工具箱

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的實用工具應用程式，專為 iOS 設計，幫助您監控裝置狀態、優化效能，並透過單一介面輕鬆使用日常工具。功能齊全，兼顧隱私與電池續航。

• 儲存空間使用：分析已用與可用空間
• 裝置資訊：查看基本硬體與系統資訊

• 電池小貼士：提供實用省電建議

網路工具：

• Wi-Fi 資訊：查看網路名稱、IP 位址與連線狀態
• IP 查詢：查看公網 IP 的地理位置資訊

實用工具：
• 單位換算器：支援各類單位轉換
• 貨幣換算器：即時匯率與幣值轉換
• 日期時間計算器：支援工作日計算的日期差異

• 倒數計時與提醒：建立美觀倒數計時，支援提醒與重複事件
• Magic 計數器：追蹤多個計數器，提供統計與連續天數
• QR 掃描器：快速掃描二維碼
• 文件掃描器：高品質掃描與儲存文件
• 指南針與水平儀：使用裝置感應器測量方向與水平
• 螢幕方向鎖定：於應用內鎖定螢幕方向
• 音量測量儀：透過麥克風測量環境音量
• 剪貼簿管理器：管理當前應用中的複製內容
• 手電筒：開啟裝置手電筒照明
• 螢幕亮度調整：可於應用內直接調整亮度

特色亮點：
• 簡潔直覺的導引式介面
• 無廣告、無內購
• 輕巧省電
• 支援所有 iOS 裝置
• 持續新增工具與更新
• 重視隱私與效能

適用族群：
• 裝置監控與效能優化
• 日常測量與轉換任務
• 掃描文件與 QR 碼
• 相片清理與空間管理
• 倒數提醒與計劃管理
• 追蹤習慣與統計進度
• 快速使用工具如手電筒與亮度調整
• 執行簡易網路測試診斷

立即下載 MagicKit AI，使用一款智慧又強大的工具箱，簡化您的日常工作與生活！

hk.description:
收服和養成超過2000隻以上的精美動畫後製完怪獸，成為傳說中的訓練師！並和世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！

收服、訓練和養成超過2000隻怪獸，打造專屬於你的隊伍通往勝利之路！超大型的怪物對戰RPG手遊！

夢幻怪獸是一款讓人欲罷不能的RPG手遊，主打四對四特殊回合制戰鬥，最多16隻怪獸組成一個隊伍。獨創對戰系統和上百種技能讓每一次戰鬥更加熱血和多元。終極進化你的怪獸，釋放它們的真正力量，主宰PvP賽場！您準備好進入夢幻怪獸的世界了嗎？

▶遊戲特點:
●  收集怪獸
• 捕捉和養成1000隻以上的精美動畫後製怪獸！
• 完成終極進化，釋放真正潛能。
• 收集特殊素材，解放秘密技能！

●  打造隊伍
• 用16隻怪獸，研發終極隊伍。
• 特殊回合制戰鬥，擊敗你的宿敵！
• 超過100種怪獸技能，打出致命Combo！

●  成為傳奇
• 征服六個聯盟、挑戰至上四強。超過60個小時的冒險故事！
• 探索六座島嶼和無數地下城！
• 隨著劇情，揭發隱藏在百年帝國維羅希亞華麗外表下的黑歷史。

●  Online對戰
• 和來自世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！
• 超過100支線上任務。
• 參加每週特殊活動，贏得更多豐富獎勵！

• 本遊戲內容涉及「性」、「暴力」，故建議應列級別為「輔導15歲級」。
• 本遊戲內有提供購買虛擬貨幣、物品等付費服務。
• 注意使用時間，避免沉迷於遊戲。

hk.description:
《旋轉音律》是一款活用了手機陀螺儀功能的體感音樂遊戲。力求帶來前所未有的嶄新音樂遊戲體驗。 旋轉手機，感受在星河間穿梭的快感。帶上耳機，共赴鼓點與星光相伴宇宙之旅。

 =用體感，玩音樂= 
不同於傳統音遊的點按式判定，在《旋轉音律》中，你需要通過快速旋轉手機來完成部分音符的判定——就像駕駛賽車穿越急彎那樣。這將會是如同街機般爽快的音樂遊戲體驗。

 =風格多變的音樂曲目= 
眾多音遊知名曲師參與供稿並提供獨家曲目！電音、JPOP、西方歌劇、韓文流行、重金搖滾，風格多樣不單調。更有豐富新曲目定期加入遊戲曲庫。

 =夢與約定之地，愛與成長之旅= 
跟隨伊洛踏上宇宙之旅，追尋友人的足跡，邂逅不同星球的居民，拯救阿古亞星的命運。一路見證伊洛的成長吧！


※因遊戲內容涉及「性」-遊戲角色穿著凸顯性特徵之服飾或裝扮但不涉及性暗示，依遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為「輔導十二歲級」。
※問題回饋：rotaeno@xd.com

遊戲以治療入侵者到來猛攻成為保護地牢守護者！
盲目地扔你有武器，它必須以免攻擊地牢。
級別和項目養殖，地牢重塑，從性能的保證，雅可怕的敵人當心！

hk.releaseNotes:
We’ve made some awesome improvements to your baseball experience! Check out what’s new:

• Improved Graphics: Enjoy smoother visuals and a more polished look.
• New Doodle Characters: Build your team with fresh, quirky doodle players.
• New Bowling Styles: Try out exciting new ways to pitch and play.
• More Settings: Switch between portrait/landscape and fine-tune your sound.

Update now and step up to the plate with the best version yet!
hk.description:
Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you’re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more!

Key Features:

Baseball Action Like Never Before:
Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter’s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun!

Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay:
Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops!

Collectible Doodle Characters:
Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments.

Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun:
Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action!

Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound:
Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run.

Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure.

Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

hk.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

hk.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

hk.description:
重要
它不支持：iPhone 5S，iPad Air，iPad Mini 2＆3和iPod Touch

This Is the Police 2是廣受好評的黑色劇“This Is the Police”的續集，你可以在其中酌情解釋法律！運行警長的部門，管理你的員警，調查，審問和監禁。在這個由故事推動的冒險、戰略和回合制戰術戰鬥混合遊戲中，做出艱難的決定 - 並儘量避免自己入獄！

這是模擬？管理遊戲？戰術挑戰？視覺小說？謎題？全部都是，還不止！

深入獨一無二的故事推動體驗。
歡迎來到夏普伍德，一個寒冷而嚴酷的邊境小鎮，充滿了暴力，沒有人是完全無辜的。這個城鎮是走私者、幫派和尖叫的民粹主義者的老巢。為了維護和平與秩序，年輕的警長莉莉·裡德（莎拉·漢密爾頓）不得不與逃犯傑克·博伊德（喬恩·聖約翰）合作，並祈禱她的危險計畫不會失控。

掌管警長的部門。
你的下屬不僅僅是一些資源，他們是有各自長處、弱點、恐懼和偏見的活人 - 為了存活，你必須應對所有這些人。你的人喝得太多了嗎？或者總是有不上班的藉口？還是他拒絕遵守命令？如果想在這個部門維持紀律，你必須施展堅定的手腕。

參與戰術戰鬥。
在最危險的操作中，遊戲將切換到回合制戰鬥。召集你最好的員警團隊。仔細研究地形，調整計畫，悄悄接近嫌疑人並使用非致命武器和裝備 - 如果情況允許的話。沒錯，有時槍戰幾乎是不可避免的，但要小心：“This Is the Police 2”遊戲沒有生命值。一顆子彈就可能讓員警喪命。

成為一名真正的偵探。
收集證據，研究案件材料，審問嫌犯並將罪犯送上法庭。如果嫌疑人是無辜的？也許是時候看看是否可以收買夏普伍德的法官。

hk.description:
概覽

— 先進 RAW 編輯功能: 運用強大的 Apple RAW 引擎，獨特的相片調整

— 整理: 整理及管理圖庫 (需要安裝 Catalina). 支援 iCloud 圖庫及在多部 Apple 裝置上同步
 
— 評級與篩選: 透過檔案類型，評級，標誌及編輯狀態篩選相片．評級及標誌均能透過 iCloud 同步！

— 檔案: 在圖庫或檔案儲存相片. 透過分享延伸直接輸入至 RAW Power. (不支援 iCloud 同步) 

— 跨平台編輯: 從一部裝置開始，另一部完成 (兩部裝置均需安裝 RAW Power) 

— 集合處理: 在多張相片運用預設，自動強化或白平衡，貼上調整及輸出相片

除 RAW 外, RAW Power 亦能在 JPEG 類型相片運用 Apple Photos 缺少的功能，同時支援在具有雙鏡頭系統手機拍攝的相片運用景深效果

管理及顯示

— 放大至 800%

— 新增及重新命名圖庫，在相簿或圖庫刪除相片及將相片輸入至相簿

— 檢視檔案名稱，曝光詳情，閃光狀態及具地圖的地理位置

實時編輯
— 支援無損編輯，所有編輯君儲存於 iOS 圖庫及 iCloud 圖庫

— 兼容較細螢幕，可自訂顯示及編排預設調整 

— 實時控制 Apple RAW，包括降低雜訊，調整黑點，伽瑪位置及更多

— 運用預設，在一張或多張相片上複製及貼上調整

— 在多張相片同時運用運用自動強化，白平衡及色調曲線

— 載有過度曝光及熱像素的色階分佈圖

— 不同預設的 LUT 及模擬菲林效果

— 裁切及拉直，旋轉及翻轉，支援自動及自定白平衡，HSL 顏色

— 亮部，暗部，鮮艷度，局部對比，亮化及暗化

— 色調曲線及水平．色調曲線有線性，實驗模式及選擇器

— 透過雙鏡頭以達至景深效果

— 彩色邊緣修正，角度，黑白及可調整中心點的漸暈

— 所有調整均為實時及 GPU 加速

— 準確，深層次顏色處理引擎

— 輸出 JPEG, PNG 或 TIFF (8 或 16 位元) 至檔案或 相片

兼容性

— 兼容眾多相機型號，詳情請參閱 (iOS 14) https://www.gentlemencoders.com/extended-raw/index.html, RAW 支援均透過 APPLE 於背景下載.  你的裝置需透過 Wi-fi 連線至網路以

— 兼容 JPEG, TIFF, PNG 及大部分的 DNG 

— 影片教學: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7l78rOzFxaHG-e5AT-MGWQ

在 Mac 上的 RAW Power 

RAW Power  亦可從 Mac App Store 下載並以獨立或延伸運作，在全球獲評為 4.5 星! 

有關

Gentlemen Coders 由前 Apple 工程師創立，詳情請參閱 www.gentlemencoders.com

mo.description:
收服和養成超過2000隻以上的精美動畫後製完怪獸，成為傳說中的訓練師！並和世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！

收服、訓練和養成超過2000隻怪獸，打造專屬於你的隊伍通往勝利之路！超大型的怪物對戰RPG手遊！

夢幻怪獸是一款讓人欲罷不能的RPG手遊，主打四對四特殊回合制戰鬥，最多16隻怪獸組成一個隊伍。獨創對戰系統和上百種技能讓每一次戰鬥更加熱血和多元。終極進化你的怪獸，釋放它們的真正力量，主宰PvP賽場！您準備好進入夢幻怪獸的世界了嗎？

▶遊戲特點:
●  收集怪獸
• 捕捉和養成1000隻以上的精美動畫後製怪獸！
• 完成終極進化，釋放真正潛能。
• 收集特殊素材，解放秘密技能！

●  打造隊伍
• 用16隻怪獸，研發終極隊伍。
• 特殊回合制戰鬥，擊敗你的宿敵！
• 超過100種怪獸技能，打出致命Combo！

●  成為傳奇
• 征服六個聯盟、挑戰至上四強。超過60個小時的冒險故事！
• 探索六座島嶼和無數地下城！
• 隨著劇情，揭發隱藏在百年帝國維羅希亞華麗外表下的黑歷史。

●  Online對戰
• 和來自世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！
• 超過100支線上任務。
• 參加每週特殊活動，贏得更多豐富獎勵！

• 本遊戲內容涉及「性」、「暴力」，故建議應列級別為「輔導15歲級」。
• 本遊戲內有提供購買虛擬貨幣、物品等付費服務。
• 注意使用時間，避免沉迷於遊戲。

mo.description:
《旋轉音律》是一款活用了手機陀螺儀功能的體感音樂遊戲。力求帶來前所未有的嶄新音樂遊戲體驗。 旋轉手機，感受在星河間穿梭的快感。帶上耳機，共赴鼓點與星光相伴宇宙之旅。

 =用體感，玩音樂= 
不同於傳統音遊的點按式判定，在《旋轉音律》中，你需要通過快速旋轉手機來完成部分音符的判定——就像駕駛賽車穿越急彎那樣。這將會是如同街機般爽快的音樂遊戲體驗。

 =風格多變的音樂曲目= 
眾多音遊知名曲師參與供稿並提供獨家曲目！電音、JPOP、西方歌劇、韓文流行、重金搖滾，風格多樣不單調。更有豐富新曲目定期加入遊戲曲庫。

 =夢與約定之地，愛與成長之旅= 
跟隨伊洛踏上宇宙之旅，追尋友人的足跡，邂逅不同星球的居民，拯救阿古亞星的命運。一路見證伊洛的成長吧！


※因遊戲內容涉及「性」-遊戲角色穿著凸顯性特徵之服飾或裝扮但不涉及性暗示，依遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為「輔導十二歲級」。
※問題回饋：rotaeno@xd.com

mo.releaseNotes:
We’ve made some awesome improvements to your baseball experience! Check out what’s new:

• Improved Graphics: Enjoy smoother visuals and a more polished look.
• New Doodle Characters: Build your team with fresh, quirky doodle players.
• New Bowling Styles: Try out exciting new ways to pitch and play.
• More Settings: Switch between portrait/landscape and fine-tune your sound.

Update now and step up to the plate with the best version yet!
mo.description:
Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you’re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more!

Key Features:

Baseball Action Like Never Before:
Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter’s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun!

Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay:
Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops!

Collectible Doodle Characters:
Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments.

Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun:
Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action!

Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound:
Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run.

Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure.

Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

mo.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

mo.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

mo.description:
重要
它不支持：iPhone 5S，iPad Air，iPad Mini 2＆3和iPod Touch

This Is the Police 2是廣受好評的黑色劇“This Is the Police”的續集，你可以在其中酌情解釋法律！運行警長的部門，管理你的員警，調查，審問和監禁。在這個由故事推動的冒險、戰略和回合制戰術戰鬥混合遊戲中，做出艱難的決定 - 並儘量避免自己入獄！

這是模擬？管理遊戲？戰術挑戰？視覺小說？謎題？全部都是，還不止！

深入獨一無二的故事推動體驗。
歡迎來到夏普伍德，一個寒冷而嚴酷的邊境小鎮，充滿了暴力，沒有人是完全無辜的。這個城鎮是走私者、幫派和尖叫的民粹主義者的老巢。為了維護和平與秩序，年輕的警長莉莉·裡德（莎拉·漢密爾頓）不得不與逃犯傑克·博伊德（喬恩·聖約翰）合作，並祈禱她的危險計畫不會失控。

掌管警長的部門。
你的下屬不僅僅是一些資源，他們是有各自長處、弱點、恐懼和偏見的活人 - 為了存活，你必須應對所有這些人。你的人喝得太多了嗎？或者總是有不上班的藉口？還是他拒絕遵守命令？如果想在這個部門維持紀律，你必須施展堅定的手腕。

參與戰術戰鬥。
在最危險的操作中，遊戲將切換到回合制戰鬥。召集你最好的員警團隊。仔細研究地形，調整計畫，悄悄接近嫌疑人並使用非致命武器和裝備 - 如果情況允許的話。沒錯，有時槍戰幾乎是不可避免的，但要小心：“This Is the Police 2”遊戲沒有生命值。一顆子彈就可能讓員警喪命。

成為一名真正的偵探。
收集證據，研究案件材料，審問嫌犯並將罪犯送上法庭。如果嫌疑人是無辜的？也許是時候看看是否可以收買夏普伍德的法官。

We’ve made some awesome improvements to your baseball experience! Check out what’s new:

• Improved Graphics: Enjoy smoother visuals and a more polished look.
• New Doodle Characters: Build your team with fresh, quirky doodle players.

Update now and step up to the plate with the best version yet!
mo.description:
Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you’re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more!

Key Features:

Baseball Action Like Never Before:
Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter’s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun!

Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay:
Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops!

Collectible Doodle Characters:
Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments.

Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun:
Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action!

Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound:
Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run.

Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure.

Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

mo.description:
概覽

— 先進 RAW 編輯功能: 運用強大的 Apple RAW 引擎，獨特的相片調整

— 整理: 整理及管理圖庫 (需要安裝 Catalina). 支援 iCloud 圖庫及在多部 Apple 裝置上同步
 
— 評級與篩選: 透過檔案類型，評級，標誌及編輯狀態篩選相片．評級及標誌均能透過 iCloud 同步！

— 檔案: 在圖庫或檔案儲存相片. 透過分享延伸直接輸入至 RAW Power. (不支援 iCloud 同步) 

— 跨平台編輯: 從一部裝置開始，另一部完成 (兩部裝置均需安裝 RAW Power) 

— 集合處理: 在多張相片運用預設，自動強化或白平衡，貼上調整及輸出相片

除 RAW 外, RAW Power 亦能在 JPEG 類型相片運用 Apple Photos 缺少的功能，同時支援在具有雙鏡頭系統手機拍攝的相片運用景深效果

管理及顯示

— 放大至 800%

— 新增及重新命名圖庫，在相簿或圖庫刪除相片及將相片輸入至相簿

— 檢視檔案名稱，曝光詳情，閃光狀態及具地圖的地理位置

實時編輯
— 支援無損編輯，所有編輯君儲存於 iOS 圖庫及 iCloud 圖庫

— 兼容較細螢幕，可自訂顯示及編排預設調整 

— 實時控制 Apple RAW，包括降低雜訊，調整黑點，伽瑪位置及更多

— 運用預設，在一張或多張相片上複製及貼上調整

— 在多張相片同時運用運用自動強化，白平衡及色調曲線

— 載有過度曝光及熱像素的色階分佈圖

— 不同預設的 LUT 及模擬菲林效果

— 裁切及拉直，旋轉及翻轉，支援自動及自定白平衡，HSL 顏色

— 亮部，暗部，鮮艷度，局部對比，亮化及暗化

— 色調曲線及水平．色調曲線有線性，實驗模式及選擇器

— 透過雙鏡頭以達至景深效果

— 彩色邊緣修正，角度，黑白及可調整中心點的漸暈

— 所有調整均為實時及 GPU 加速

— 準確，深層次顏色處理引擎

— 輸出 JPEG, PNG 或 TIFF (8 或 16 位元) 至檔案或 相片

兼容性

— 兼容眾多相機型號，詳情請參閱 (iOS 14) https://www.gentlemencoders.com/extended-raw/index.html, RAW 支援均透過 APPLE 於背景下載.  你的裝置需透過 Wi-fi 連線至網路以

— 兼容 JPEG, TIFF, PNG 及大部分的 DNG 

— 影片教學: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7l78rOzFxaHG-e5AT-MGWQ

在 Mac 上的 RAW Power 

RAW Power  亦可從 Mac App Store 下載並以獨立或延伸運作，在全球獲評為 4.5 星! 

有關

Gentlemen Coders 由前 Apple 工程師創立，詳情請參閱 www.gentlemencoders.com

tw.description:
MagicKit AI – 全方位裝置與工具箱

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的實用工具應用程式，專為 iOS 設計，幫助您監控裝置狀態、優化效能，並透過單一介面輕鬆使用日常工具。功能齊全，兼顧隱私與電池續航。

• 電池狀態：查看目前電量與充電情況

實用工具：

收服和養成超過2000隻以上的精美動畫後製完怪獸，成為傳說中的訓練師！並和世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！

夢幻怪獸是一款讓人欲罷不能的RPG手遊，主打四對四特殊回合制戰鬥，最多16隻怪獸組成一個隊伍。獨創對戰系統和上百種技能讓每一次戰鬥更加熱血和多元。終極進化你的怪獸，釋放它們的真正力量，主宰PvP賽場！您準備好進入夢幻怪獸的世界了嗎？

▶遊戲特點:
●  收集怪獸
• 捕捉和養成1000隻以上的精美動畫後製怪獸！
• 完成終極進化，釋放真正潛能。
• 收集特殊素材，解放秘密技能！

●  打造隊伍
• 用16隻怪獸，研發終極隊伍。
• 特殊回合制戰鬥，擊敗你的宿敵！
• 超過100種怪獸技能，打出致命Combo！

●  成為傳奇
• 征服六個聯盟、挑戰至上四強。超過60個小時的冒險故事！
• 探索六座島嶼和無數地下城！
• 隨著劇情，揭發隱藏在百年帝國維羅希亞華麗外表下的黑歷史。

●  Online對戰
• 和來自世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！
• 超過100支線上任務。

tw.description:
《旋轉音律》是一款活用了手機陀螺儀功能的體感音樂遊戲。力求帶來前所未有的嶄新音樂遊戲體驗。 旋轉手機，感受在星河間穿梭的快感。帶上耳機，共赴鼓點與星光相伴宇宙之旅。

 =用體感，玩音樂= 
不同於傳統音遊的點按式判定，在《旋轉音律》中，你需要通過快速旋轉手機來完成部分音符的判定——就像駕駛賽車穿越急彎那樣。這將會是如同街機般爽快的音樂遊戲體驗。

 =風格多變的音樂曲目= 
眾多音遊知名曲師參與供稿並提供獨家曲目！電音、JPOP、西方歌劇、韓文流行、重金搖滾，風格多樣不單調。更有豐富新曲目定期加入遊戲曲庫。

 =夢與約定之地，愛與成長之旅= 
跟隨伊洛踏上宇宙之旅，追尋友人的足跡，邂逅不同星球的居民，拯救阿古亞星的命運。一路見證伊洛的成長吧！


※因遊戲內容涉及「性」-遊戲角色穿著凸顯性特徵之服飾或裝扮但不涉及性暗示，依遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為「輔導十二歲級」。

We’ve made some awesome improvements to your baseball experience! Check out what’s new:

• Improved Graphics: Enjoy smoother visuals and a more polished look.
• New Doodle Characters: Build your team with fresh, quirky doodle players.
• New Bowling Styles: Try out exciting new ways to pitch and play.
• More Settings: Switch between portrait/landscape and fine-tune your sound.

Update now and step up to the plate with the best version yet!
tw.description:
Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you’re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more!

Key Features:

Baseball Action Like Never Before:
Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter’s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun!

Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay:
Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops!

Collectible Doodle Characters:
Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments.

Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun:
Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action!

Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound:
Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run.

Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure.

Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

tw.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

tw.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

重要
它不支持：iPhone 5S，iPad Air，iPad Mini 2＆3和iPod Touch

This Is the Police 2是廣受好評的黑色劇“This Is the Police”的續集，你可以在其中酌情解釋法律！運行警長的部門，管理你的員警，調查，審問和監禁。在這個由故事推動的冒險、戰略和回合制戰術戰鬥混合遊戲中，做出艱難的決定 - 並儘量避免自己入獄！

這是模擬？管理遊戲？戰術挑戰？視覺小說？謎題？全部都是，還不止！

深入獨一無二的故事推動體驗。
歡迎來到夏普伍德，一個寒冷而嚴酷的邊境小鎮，充滿了暴力，沒有人是完全無辜的。這個城鎮是走私者、幫派和尖叫的民粹主義者的老巢。為了維護和平與秩序，年輕的警長莉莉·裡德（莎拉·漢密爾頓）不得不與逃犯傑克·博伊德（喬恩·聖約翰）合作，並祈禱她的危險計畫不會失控。

掌管警長的部門。
你的下屬不僅僅是一些資源，他們是有各自長處、弱點、恐懼和偏見的活人 - 為了存活，你必須應對所有這些人。你的人喝得太多了嗎？或者總是有不上班的藉口？還是他拒絕遵守命令？如果想在這個部門維持紀律，你必須施展堅定的手腕。

參與戰術戰鬥。
在最危險的操作中，遊戲將切換到回合制戰鬥。召集你最好的員警團隊。仔細研究地形，調整計畫，悄悄接近嫌疑人並使用非致命武器和裝備 - 如果情況允許的話。沒錯，有時槍戰幾乎是不可避免的，但要小心：“This Is the Police 2”遊戲沒有生命值。一顆子彈就可能讓員警喪命。

成為一名真正的偵探。
收集證據，研究案件材料，審問嫌犯並將罪犯送上法庭。如果嫌疑人是無辜的？也許是時候看看是否可以收買夏普伍德的法官。

tw.description:
概覽

— 先進 RAW 編輯功能: 運用強大的 Apple RAW 引擎，獨特的相片調整

— 整理: 整理及管理圖庫 (需要安裝 Catalina). 支援 iCloud 圖庫及在多部 Apple 裝置上同步
 
— 評級與篩選: 透過檔案類型，評級，標誌及編輯狀態篩選相片．評級及標誌均能透過 iCloud 同步！

— 檔案: 在圖庫或檔案儲存相片. 透過分享延伸直接輸入至 RAW Power. (不支援 iCloud 同步) 

— 跨平台編輯: 從一部裝置開始，另一部完成 (兩部裝置均需安裝 RAW Power) 

— 集合處理: 在多張相片運用預設，自動強化或白平衡，貼上調整及輸出相片

除 RAW 外, RAW Power 亦能在 JPEG 類型相片運用 Apple Photos 缺少的功能，同時支援在具有雙鏡頭系統手機拍攝的相片運用景深效果

管理及顯示

— 放大至 800%

— 新增及重新命名圖庫，在相簿或圖庫刪除相片及將相片輸入至相簿

— 檢視檔案名稱，曝光詳情，閃光狀態及具地圖的地理位置

實時編輯
— 支援無損編輯，所有編輯君儲存於 iOS 圖庫及 iCloud 圖庫

— 兼容較細螢幕，可自訂顯示及編排預設調整 

— 實時控制 Apple RAW，包括降低雜訊，調整黑點，伽瑪位置及更多

— 運用預設，在一張或多張相片上複製及貼上調整

— 在多張相片同時運用運用自動強化，白平衡及色調曲線

— 載有過度曝光及熱像素的色階分佈圖

— 不同預設的 LUT 及模擬菲林效果

— 裁切及拉直，旋轉及翻轉，支援自動及自定白平衡，HSL 顏色

— 亮部，暗部，鮮艷度，局部對比，亮化及暗化

— 色調曲線及水平．色調曲線有線性，實驗模式及選擇器

— 透過雙鏡頭以達至景深效果

— 彩色邊緣修正，角度，黑白及可調整中心點的漸暈

— 所有調整均為實時及 GPU 加速

— 準確，深層次顏色處理引擎

— 輸出 JPEG, PNG 或 TIFF (8 或 16 位元) 至檔案或 相片

兼容性

— 兼容眾多相機型號，詳情請參閱 (iOS 14) https://www.gentlemencoders.com/extended-raw/index.html, RAW 支援均透過 APPLE 於背景下載.  你的裝置需透過 Wi-fi 連線至網路以

— 兼容 JPEG, TIFF, PNG 及大部分的 DNG 

— 影片教學: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7l78rOzFxaHG-e5AT-MGWQ

在 Mac 上的 RAW Power 

RAW Power  亦可從 Mac App Store 下載並以獨立或延伸運作，在全球獲評為 4.5 星! 

有關

Gentlemen Coders 由前 Apple 工程師創立，詳情請參閱 www.gentlemencoders.com

us.description:
Rotaeno is a heart-pounding, thumb-tapping, wrist-flicking rhythm game that fully utilizes your device's gyroscope for an unprecedented musical experience.
Rotate your device to hit notes as you soar through the stars. Drop into your headphones and immerse yourself in the kick beats and stellar synths of this astronautical adventure!

=A Revolutionary Way to Experience Music=
What sets Rotaeno apart is all in the name - rotation! Building on the basic controls of more traditional rhythm games, Rotaeno includes notes that require smooth turns and rapid rotations to hit, making it feel like you're drifting in a highspeed interstellar stunt race. It's a real arcade experience - in the palm of your hand!

=Multi Genre Music and Beats=
Rotaeno is loaded with exclusive tracks from renowned rhythm game composers. From EDM to JPOP, KPOP to Opera, the stylistically diverse song collection contains a future favorite song for every music lover! More songs are already planned for future updates and will be released on a regular basis.

=A Journey to Find the Promised Land, Love, and Ourselves=
Follow Ilot, our heroine, on a cosmic journey through the stars, and witness her growth as she sets out on her own. Follow in the footsteps of a friend, meet locals on different planets, and save the future of Aquaria!

*Rotaeno will only function properly on devices that feature gyroscope or accelerometer support.
Concerns or feedback? Contact us: rotaeno@xd.com

us.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

us.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

us.description:
IMPORTANT 
DOES NOT support: iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPad Mini 2 & 3 and iPod Touch

Interpret the law as you see fit in This Is the Police 2, sequel to the acclaimed noir drama This Is the Police! Run the sheriff’s department, manage your cops, investigate, interrogate, and incarcerate. Make tough decisions – and try to keep out of prison yourself! – in this story-driven mixture of adventure, strategy, and turn-based tactical combat.

Is it a simulation? A management game? A tactical challenge? A visual novel? A puzzle? It’s all of these, and more!

Dive into one-of-a-kind -story-driven experience.
Welcome to Sharpwood, a cold and harsh border town riven with violence, where no one is completely innocent. Smugglers, gangs, and screaming populists call this town their home. To maintain peace and order, the young sheriff Lilly Reed (Sarah Hamilton) will have to team up with fugitive criminal Jack Boyd (Jon St. John), and pray that her dangerous plan doesn’t spiral out of control.

Take charge of the Sheriff’s department.
Your subordinates aren’t just some resource; they are living people with their own strengths, weaknesses, fears, and prejudices – and you'll have to reckon with all of them in order to survive. Is one of your guys drinking too much? Or always coming up with excuses for not coming to work? Or does he refuse to follow orders? You’ll have to show a steady hand if you want to impose discipline on this department.

Engage in tactical combat.
During your most dangerous operations, the game will switch to turn-based combat. Gather a team of your finest cops. Carefully study the terrain, adapt your plans, stealthily approach your suspects and use non-lethal weapons and equipment – if the situation allows. True, sometimes gunfights are almost impossible to avoid, but be careful: This Is the Police 2 doesn’t have hit points. A single bullet can cost a cop their life.

Become a true detective.
Collect evidence, study case materials, interrogate suspects and send the criminals to court. And if the suspect was innocent? Perhaps it's time to find out if any Sharpwood judges can be bought.

Thank you for playing ‘THIS IS THE POLICE 2’!

us.description:
Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you’re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more!

Key Features:

Baseball Action Like Never Before:
Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter’s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun!

Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay:
Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops!

Collectible Doodle Characters:
Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments.

Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun:
Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action!

Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound:
Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run.

Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure.

Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

us.description:
OVERVIEW

	— ADVANCED RAW: Unlock the power of Apple's RAW engine with easy-to-use controls. Develop images with the same outstanding RAW processing in Apple’s Aperture professional photo app. Unique adjustments let you improve your images in ways that can't be done in any other app. 

	— ORGANIZE: RAW Power is a complete photo app to organize and manage your photo library. Fully compatible with iCloud Photo Library, so all changes are synced. Every image and every change is available to every app on your iPhone or iPad.

	— RATE & FILTER: Filter albums by file type, rating, flag, and edit state. Ratings and Flags sync over iCloud Photo Library!

	— FILES.APP: Store images in the Photos library or Files.app. Use our new Share extension to import from other apps directly into RAW Power’s Files container. Same non-destructive editing, rating, and filtering features! (iCloud syncing is not supported).

	— NOT JUST RAWs: RAW Power is great with JPEGs, with many tools missing from the Photos app. Plus an innovative Depth Effect for photos shot on iPhones with a dual camera system. 

	— EDIT CROSS-PLATFORM: Edit on iOS and continue on the Mac (or vice-versa) using RAW Power 3 for macOS. 
	— BATCH PROCESSING: Apply presets, paste adjustments, and export multiple images. Export to the photo library or to Files.app.

Using iOS 16 or later? You may be interested in Nitro Photo. It includes masking, XMP support, synchronized Pan and Zoom and many other features. Search for 'Nitro Photo' on the App Store.

ORGANIZATION AND DISPLAY

	— Zoom up to 800% for extremely precise adjustments.

	— Create and rename albums, delete images from albums and the library, and move images into albums. Full access to your folder hierarchy.

	— Display file name, exposure information, flash status, and location with a map.

REAL-TIME EDITING

	— Full non-destructive editing. All changes stored in the iOS Photo Library and iCloud Photo Library, so you can edit on one device and continue on another, without loss of quality. Even between Mac and iOS!

	— Optimized for small screens. Choose which adjustments to show by default and in what order

	— Unparalleled highlight recovery with Boost and Recovery sliders. Real-time control of Apple's RAW engine, including Noise Reduction, Black Point, Gamut Mapping and more

	— Auto Enhance, Auto White Balance, Auto Levels and Auto Curves. Apply them to multiple images at once!

	— Apply presets, and Copy / Paste Adjustments to one image or many

	— Histogram with Clipping Indicators and Hot Pixels Overlay

	— LUTs (Look up tables) with built-in looks and film simulations. Add your own!

	— Crop and Straighten, Rotate and Flip, White Balance with sampler and auto 

	— Highlights, Shadows, Vibrancy, Local Contrast and incredible Lighten and Darken sliders

	— Curves and Levels. Curves has Linear and Lab modes, and samplers

	— Depth Effect to enhance photos shot with the dual camera system

	— Chromatic Aberration to correct lens artifacts, Perspective, Black & White, Vignette with a controllable center point

	— All sliders are real-time and GPU accelerated

	— High-precision, deep color imaging engine

	— Export JPEG, PNG, and TIFFs (8- and 16-bit) to Files.app or Photos.app


COMPATIBILITY

	— Compatible with hundreds of cameras, including iPhone RAW images. (EXTENDED SUPPORT REQUIRES iOS 14. Full List at https://www.gentlemencoders.com/extended-raw/index.html) RAW support is downloaded in the background by Apple. Your device must be on WiFi and plugged in to get updates.

	— Great with JPEGs, TIFFs, PNGs, and most DNGs

	— Video Tutorials (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7l78rOzFxaHG-e5AT-MGWQ)


RAW POWER for MAC

RAW Power is also available on the Mac App Store as a Photos Extension and standalone app with Photos Library support. Rated 4.5 stars worldwide!


ABOUT GENTLEMEN CODERS

Gentlemen Coders was founded by a former Senior Director of Engineering at Apple. For more information, visit www.gentlemencoders.com.

us.description:
Photomator is the most powerful photo editing app ever designed for a mobile device. It includes an extensive collection of cutting-edge color adjustments, automatic selections powered by AI, support for over 750 RAW image formats, a magical Repair tool for removing unwanted objects, and many more powerful features, letting you enjoy pro photo editing anyplace, anytime.

Everything you need to make your photos look incredible
• Edit photos using a wide collection of powerful, nondestructive color adjustments
• Quickly make precise subject, sky, and background selections in photos using AI, add gradient masks, and easily make selections using a brush
• Effortlessly remove unwanted objects using an incredible object removal tool
• Crop, straighten, rotate, and adjust the perspective of photos with an easy-to-use Crop tool
• Instantly increase the resolution of photos using AI
• Remove camera noise and image compression artifacts with the powerful Denoise feature
• Magically remove color banding and increase color depth in photos with the AI-powered Smart Deband feature
• Make your photos stand out with photographer-designed presets for landscape, black and white, and other photography styles
• Easily copy and paste edits between photos or batch edit even hundreds of photographs at a time
• Open and edit over 750 RAW image formats, including Apple ProRAW and compressed Fujifilm RAWs
• Follow all the changes you make in the beautiful live histogram

Tools powered by AI
• Select the subject, sky, or background in a photo with just a tap
• Improve the quality of photos by reducing camera noise with the AI-powered Denoise feature, intelligently upscale photos with Super Resolution, or magically remove color banding and increase color depth using Smart Deband
• Automatically enhance shots using a machine learning algorithm trained on 20 million pro photos, or fine-tune individual adjustments, like White Balance, Selective Color, or Color Balance with a single tap
• Intelligently crop photos using the AI-powered auto-cropping
• Copy the look of any photo to another using the incredible Match Colors feature

State-of-the-art color adjustments
• Enjoy powerful tools for effortlessly adjusting the temperature, tint, exposure, contrast, brightness, hue, saturation, and vibrance in your photos
• Recover incredible amounts of detail in the highlights and shadows of photos
• Magically enhance fine details and structure in photos using powerful Clarity and Texture adjustments, or adjust textures in the highlights, midtones, and shadows separately
• Selectively edit individual color ranges with Selective Color, or improve the balance of colors in the shadows, midtones, and highlights with Color Balance
• Adjust lighting and colors with full precision using Levels and Curves adjustments
• Mix the balance of the red, green, and blue color channels to create intense color effects in your images
• Replace any color with any other using the Replace Color adjustment
• Create beautiful black and whites even from your color photos
• Use a range of additional adjustments, like Sharpen, Fade, Grain, Color Monochrome, Sepia, and Invert to make your photos stand out
• Instantly change the look of photos with LUTs or export custom LUTs to use in other apps

Compatibility
• Automatically sync every change back to your Photos or Files browser
• With the support for iCloud Drive, enjoy seamless edit syncing across Mac, iPhone, and iPad
• Photomator is built from the ground up for iPhone and iPad with a native design that blends seamlessly with the sleek and modern look of iOS and iPadOS 18
• Photomator uses powerful Apple technologies like Metal, Core ML, and Core Image to deliver staggeringly fast performance, even when editing large RAW photos or batch editing multiple images at a time

• Privacy policy: https://www.apple.com/legal/privacy/en-ww/

Strongbox is an application for keeping all your passwords safely stored and protected by one master password. Supporting the open source Password Safe and KeePass formats. 

*** Supports Family Sharing ***

*** Features ***
- Face ID/Touch ID Unlock for the ultimate in convenience, security and speed.

- PIN Code Unlock with a Duress PIN option for those tricky situations.

- Passkey support - The latest, most convenient and most secure authentication method (passkeys).

- YubiKey protection - secure your databases with a hardware token.

- Secure - protected by time tested military grade cryptography.

- Private - Isolated In-App attachments viewer for your sensitive documents, photos & videos.

- Audit your passwords - Automatically check your database for weak passwords including a 'Have I Been Pwned?' check.

- Cloud Support, so you can access your cloud safes using iCloud, Dropbox, OneDrive, Google Drive, WebDAV or SFTP even when offline. Use the built in Files app for many other storage options or store them securely only on your local device. You choose your storage.

- Search your entire set of passwords and secrets instantly and powerfully, with deep search. Autocomplete new entries, and auto generate secure passwords. 

- Compatible - Import/Export by Files app, Email, CSV, iTunes File Sharing or use cloud storage.

- Standards compliant - using the time tested Password Safe and KeePass formats so you can import any existing password safe you have.

SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

tr.description:
IMPORTANT 
DOES NOT support: iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPad Mini 2 & 3 and iPod Touch

Interpret the law as you see fit in This Is the Police 2, sequel to the acclaimed noir drama This Is the Police! Run the sheriff’s department, manage your cops, investigate, interrogate, and incarcerate. Make tough decisions – and try to keep out of prison yourself! – in this story-driven mixture of adventure, strategy, and turn-based tactical combat.

Is it a simulation? A management game? A tactical challenge? A visual novel? A puzzle? It’s all of these, and more!

Dive into one-of-a-kind -story-driven experience.
Welcome to Sharpwood, a cold and harsh border town riven with violence, where no one is completely innocent. Smugglers, gangs, and screaming populists call this town their home. To maintain peace and order, the young sheriff Lilly Reed (Sarah Hamilton) will have to team up with fugitive criminal Jack Boyd (Jon St. John), and pray that her dangerous plan doesn’t spiral out of control.

Take charge of the Sheriff’s department.
Your subordinates aren’t just some resource; they are living people with their own strengths, weaknesses, fears, and prejudices – and you'll have to reckon with all of them in order to survive. Is one of your guys drinking too much? Or always coming up with excuses for not coming to work? Or does he refuse to follow orders? You’ll have to show a steady hand if you want to impose discipline on this department.

Engage in tactical combat.
During your most dangerous operations, the game will switch to turn-based combat. Gather a team of your finest cops. Carefully study the terrain, adapt your plans, stealthily approach your suspects and use non-lethal weapons and equipment – if the situation allows. True, sometimes gunfights are almost impossible to avoid, but be careful: This Is the Police 2 doesn’t have hit points. A single bullet can cost a cop their life.

Become a true detective.
Collect evidence, study case materials, interrogate suspects and send the criminals to court. And if the suspect was innocent? Perhaps it's time to find out if any Sharpwood judges can be bought.

Thank you for playing ‘THIS IS THE POLICE 2’!

tr.description:
Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you’re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more!

Key Features:

Baseball Action Like Never Before:
Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter’s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun!

Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay:
Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops!

Collectible Doodle Characters:
Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments.

Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun:
Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action!

Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound:
Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run.

Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure.

Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

tr.description:
OVERVIEW

	— ADVANCED RAW: Unlock the power of Apple's RAW engine with easy-to-use controls. Develop images with the same outstanding RAW processing in Apple’s Aperture professional photo app. Unique adjustments let you improve your images in ways that can't be done in any other app. 

	— ORGANIZE: RAW Power is a complete photo app to organize and manage your photo library. Fully compatible with iCloud Photo Library, so all changes are synced. Every image and every change is available to every app on your iPhone or iPad.

	— RATE & FILTER: Filter albums by file type, rating, flag, and edit state. Ratings and Flags sync over iCloud Photo Library!

	— FILES.APP: Store images in the Photos library or Files.app. Use our new Share extension to import from other apps directly into RAW Power’s Files container. Same non-destructive editing, rating, and filtering features! (iCloud syncing is not supported).

	— NOT JUST RAWs: RAW Power is great with JPEGs, with many tools missing from the Photos app. Plus an innovative Depth Effect for photos shot on iPhones with a dual camera system. 

	— EDIT CROSS-PLATFORM: Edit on iOS and continue on the Mac (or vice-versa) using RAW Power 3 for macOS. 
	— BATCH PROCESSING: Apply presets, paste adjustments, and export multiple images. Export to the photo library or to Files.app.

Using iOS 16 or later? You may be interested in Nitro Photo. It includes masking, XMP support, synchronized Pan and Zoom and many other features. Search for 'Nitro Photo' on the App Store.

ORGANIZATION AND DISPLAY

	— Zoom up to 800% for extremely precise adjustments.

	— Create and rename albums, delete images from albums and the library, and move images into albums. Full access to your folder hierarchy.

	— Display file name, exposure information, flash status, and location with a map.

REAL-TIME EDITING

	— Full non-destructive editing. All changes stored in the iOS Photo Library and iCloud Photo Library, so you can edit on one device and continue on another, without loss of quality. Even between Mac and iOS!

	— Optimized for small screens. Choose which adjustments to show by default and in what order

	— Unparalleled highlight recovery with Boost and Recovery sliders. Real-time control of Apple's RAW engine, including Noise Reduction, Black Point, Gamut Mapping and more

	— Auto Enhance, Auto White Balance, Auto Levels and Auto Curves. Apply them to multiple images at once!

	— Apply presets, and Copy / Paste Adjustments to one image or many

	— Histogram with Clipping Indicators and Hot Pixels Overlay

	— LUTs (Look up tables) with built-in looks and film simulations. Add your own!

	— Crop and Straighten, Rotate and Flip, White Balance with sampler and auto 

	— Highlights, Shadows, Vibrancy, Local Contrast and incredible Lighten and Darken sliders

	— Curves and Levels. Curves has Linear and Lab modes, and samplers

	— Depth Effect to enhance photos shot with the dual camera system

	— Chromatic Aberration to correct lens artifacts, Perspective, Black & White, Vignette with a controllable center point

	— All sliders are real-time and GPU accelerated

	— High-precision, deep color imaging engine

	— Export JPEG, PNG, and TIFFs (8- and 16-bit) to Files.app or Photos.app


COMPATIBILITY

	— Compatible with hundreds of cameras, including iPhone RAW images. (EXTENDED SUPPORT REQUIRES iOS 14. Full List at https://www.gentlemencoders.com/extended-raw/index.html) RAW support is downloaded in the background by Apple. Your device must be on WiFi and plugged in to get updates.

	— Great with JPEGs, TIFFs, PNGs, and most DNGs

	— Video Tutorials (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7l78rOzFxaHG-e5AT-MGWQ)


RAW POWER for MAC

RAW Power is also available on the Mac App Store as a Photos Extension and standalone app with Photos Library support. Rated 4.5 stars worldwide!


ABOUT GENTLEMEN CODERS

Gentlemen Coders was founded by a former Senior Director of Engineering at Apple. For more information, visit www.gentlemencoders.com.

Rotaeno is a heart-pounding, thumb-tapping, wrist-flicking rhythm game that fully utilizes your device's gyroscope for an unprecedented musical experience.
Rotate your device to hit notes as you soar through the stars. Drop into your headphones and immerse yourself in the kick beats and stellar synths of this astronautical adventure!

=A Revolutionary Way to Experience Music=
What sets Rotaeno apart is all in the name - rotation! Building on the basic controls of more traditional rhythm games, Rotaeno includes notes that require smooth turns and rapid rotations to hit, making it feel like you're drifting in a highspeed interstellar stunt race. It's a real arcade experience - in the palm of your hand!

=Multi Genre Music and Beats=
Rotaeno is loaded with exclusive tracks from renowned rhythm game composers. From EDM to JPOP, KPOP to Opera, the stylistically diverse song collection contains a future favorite song for every music lover! More songs are already planned for future updates and will be released on a regular basis.

=A Journey to Find the Promised Land, Love, and Ourselves=
Follow Ilot, our heroine, on a cosmic journey through the stars, and witness her growth as she sets out on her own. Follow in the footsteps of a friend, meet locals on different planets, and save the future of Aquaria!

*Rotaeno will only function properly on devices that feature gyroscope or accelerometer support.
Concerns or feedback? Contact us: rotaeno@xd.com

pt.description:
CatBox Todo é uma aplicação de tarefas adorada por amantes de gatos em todo o mundo. Uma nova aplicação de lista de tarefas com estilo minimalista, com gatos vivos e adoráveis e temas.

• Filosofia de design
A CatBox pretende que os utilizadores se sintam confortáveis ao serem acompanhados por gatinhos vivos. Os gatos terão várias ações diárias e reações a carícias, e encorajarão os utilizadores como um assistente. O design do Todo é mais focado em reproduzir a forma da vida diária, com um design extremamente minimalista, focado em funções essenciais e redução de distrações.

• Recursos
• Os gatos acompanhá-lo-ão de forma vívida ao longo do seu dia a dia, e não apenas o encorajarão quando concluir as tarefas, mas também em momentos divertidos como comer e dormir, como um amigo.
• Mantenha as suas tarefas claras e concisas - utilize o CatBox Todo para registar tarefas importantes, de forma simples e direta.
• A visualização em quatro quadrantes permite um melhor foco nas coisas importantes.
• O CatBox Todo suporta os widgets mais recentes e substitui-los-á de acordo com os temas.
• Skins de gatos vivos e adoráveis estão disponíveis por assinatura ou compra individual.
• Utiliza o Apple Intelligence para adaptação ao iOS 26.

https://nicolecat.com/cat/terms.html

pt.description:
O Strongbox é uma aplicação para manter todas suas senhas armazenadas com segurança e protegidas por uma senha mestra. São suportados of formatos abertos PasswordSafe e KeePass.

*** Funcionalidades ***
- Desbloqueio com Face ID/Touch ID para garantir a maior conveniência, segurança e velocidade de acesso possiveis.

- Desbloqueio com Código PIN com opção de PIN sob Coerção para lidar com situações difíceis.

- Proteção YubiKey - proteja suas bases de dados com um token físico.

- Seguro - protegido por criptografia de nível militar.

- Privativo - Um visualizador de anexos embutido no aplicativo protege seus documentos, fotos e vídeos.

- Audite suas senhas - Automaticamente consulte se sua base de dados contém senhas fracas, incluindo consultas com o 'Have I Been Pwned'.

- Suporte a Nuvem, para que você consiga acessar seus cofres armazenados no iCloud, Dropbox, OneDrive, Google Drive, WebDAV ou SFTP mesmo quando estiver offline. Use o app Arquivos para ter muito mais opções de armazenamento ou guarde seu cofre de maneira segura apenas no seu dispositivo. Você escolhe onde guardar seu cofre.

- Consulte todas as suas senhas e segredos instantaneamente usando uma busca poderosa e profunda. Autocomplete novos registros e gere automaticamente senhas seguras.

- Compatível - Importe/Exporte usando o app Arquivos, Email, CSV, Compartilhamento de Arquivos do iTunes ou armazenamento na nuvem.

- Padrões da Indústria - São usados os formatos já testados pelo tempo Password Safe e KeePass, então você pode importar qualquer cofre de senhas que tiver.

- Abundância de Funcionalidades
	- Geração de senhas incrivelmente configurável incluindo Diceware (XKCD) e senhas normais.
	- Auto limpeza da área de transferência após tempo definido.
	- Histórico de registro.
	- Referências de Campos do KeePass, Etiquetas, Ícones Personalizados, FavIcons (incluindo busca e download automáticos).
	- Suporte a geração de códigos de Autenticação em Duas Etapas (TOTP) - QR Codes, Steam e Manuais.
	
	*** O Strongbox é Freemium ***
Isso significa que o Strongbox é gratuito com um conjunto básico de funcionalidades, mas se você quiser existem funcionalidades melhoradas na versão Pro. Você pode se inscrever em um Período de Testes Gratuito por 90 dias para testar todas as funcionalidades Pro que quiser, sem obrigações, mas a maioria das pessoas considera a versão gratuita perfeitamente adequada.

---------------------------------------------------------------------
• O Strongbox provê Compras no Aplicativo (tanto para assinaturas auto renováveis quanto para o pagamento único) das versões Pro do App.
• Uma opção de pagamento adiantado (que não é feita dentro do App) também existe, consulte o site do Strongbox para mais detalhes.
• Assinaturas são auto renováveis com pagamentos recorrentes. Cancele a qualquer momento.
• Os períodos de tempo das assinaturas são mensal, trimestral ou anual, à escolha do usuário.
• O usuário também pode escolher comprar, com um pagamento único, uma versão Pro vitalícia do App.
• O pagamento será cobrado da sua Conta iTunes na confirmação da compra.
• A assinatura é renovada automaticamente a menos que a auto renovação seja desativada com pelo menos 24 horas de antecedência do fim do período atual.
• A Conta iTunes será cobrada pela renovação dentro das 24 horas antecedentes ao fim do período atual, e identificará o custo da renovação.
• Assinaturas podem ser gerenciadas e a auto renovação pode ser desligada na página de Configuração da Conta após a compra.
• Qualquer porção não utilizada do período de testes, se oferecido, será revogada quando o usuário comprar uma assinatura onde aplicável.
• A Política de Privacidade pode ser encontrada aqui: https://strongboxsafe.com/privacy-policy
• Os Termos de Uso podem ser encontrados aqui: https://strongboxsafe.com/terms

pt.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

pt.description:
IMPORTANTE
NÃO suporta: iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPad Mini 2 e 3 e iPod Touch

Interpreta a lei como entenderes em This is the Police 2, a sequela do aclamado drama noir "This Is the Police!". Administra a esquadra do xerife, gere os teus agentes, investiga, interroga e prende. Toma decisões difíceis - e tenta permanecer fora da prisão! - nesta mistura de aventura, estratégia e combate tático por turnos.

É uma simulação? Um jogo de gestão? Um desafio tático? Um romance visual? Um enigma? É tudo isto e muito mais!

Envolve-te numa experiência única guiada pela história.
Bem-vindo a Sharpwood. Uma cidade fronteiriça fria e agreste dilacerada pela violência, onde ninguém é completamente inocente. Contrabandistas, gangues e populistas radicais  dizem que esta cidade é a sua casa. Para manter a paz e a ordem, a jovem xerife Lilly Reed (Sarah Hamilton) terá que se juntar ao criminoso fugitivo Jack Boyd (Jon St. John) e rezar para que o seu perigoso plano não se descontrole.

Assume o comando da esquadra do xerife.
Os teus subordinados não são uns meros recursos; são pessoas comuns com as suas próprias forças, fraquezas, medos e preconceitos - e terás que contar com todos para sobreviveres. Alguém anda a beber demais? Ou arranja sempre desculpas para faltar ao trabalho? Ou recusa-se a cumprir ordens? Terás que mostrar mão firme se quiseres impor disciplina nesta esquadra.

Envolve-te em combate tático.
Durante as tuas operações mais perigosas, o jogo muda para o combate por turnos. Reúne uma equipa com os teus melhores agentes. Estuda cuidadosamente o terreno, ajusta os teus planos, aproxima-te furtivamente dos teus suspeitos e usa armas e equipamentos não letais - se a situação permitir. Mas como nem sempre é possível evitar os tiroteios tem cuidado: "This Is the Police 2" não tem pontos de vida. Uma simples bala pode custar a vida a um polícia.

Sê um verdadeiro detetive.
Recolhe indícios, estuda provas, interroga suspeitos e manda os criminosos para tribunal. E se o suspeito era inocente? Talvez esteja na hora de descobrir se algum juiz de Sharpwood pode ser comprado.

pt.releaseNotes:
We’ve made some awesome improvements to your baseball experience! Check out what’s new:

• Improved Graphics: Enjoy smoother visuals and a more polished look.
• New Doodle Characters: Build your team with fresh, quirky doodle players.
• New Bowling Styles: Try out exciting new ways to pitch and play.
• More Settings: Switch between portrait/landscape and fine-tune your sound.

Update now and step up to the plate with the best version yet!
pt.description:
Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you’re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more!

Key Features:

Baseball Action Like Never Before:
Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter’s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun!

Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay:
Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops!

Collectible Doodle Characters:
Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments.

Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun:
Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action!

Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound:
Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run.

Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure.

Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

pt.description:
OVERVIEW

	— ADVANCED RAW: Unlock the power of Apple's RAW engine with easy-to-use controls. Develop images with the same outstanding RAW processing in Apple’s Aperture professional photo app. Unique adjustments let you improve your images in ways that can't be done in any other app. 

	— ORGANIZE: RAW Power is a complete photo app to organize and manage your photo library. Fully compatible with iCloud Photo Library, so all changes are synced. Every image and every change is available to every app on your iPhone or iPad.

	— RATE & FILTER: Filter albums by file type, rating, flag, and edit state. Ratings and Flags sync over iCloud Photo Library!

	— FILES.APP: Store images in the Photos library or Files.app. Use our new Share extension to import from other apps directly into RAW Power’s Files container. Same non-destructive editing, rating, and filtering features! (iCloud syncing is not supported).

	— NOT JUST RAWs: RAW Power is great with JPEGs, with many tools missing from the Photos app. Plus an innovative Depth Effect for photos shot on iPhones with a dual camera system. 

	— EDIT CROSS-PLATFORM: Edit on iOS and continue on the Mac (or vice-versa) using RAW Power 3 for macOS. 
	— BATCH PROCESSING: Apply presets, paste adjustments, and export multiple images. Export to the photo library or to Files.app.

Using iOS 16 or later? You may be interested in Nitro Photo. It includes masking, XMP support, synchronized Pan and Zoom and many other features. Search for 'Nitro Photo' on the App Store.
